ðŸ“– Summary: PyRoki is a Python toolkit for robot kinematic optimization. It provides differentiable forward kinematics, automatic collision primitive generation, and various cost implementations. It supports cross-platform execution via JAX and integrates with a Levenberg-Marquardt solver for optimization on manifolds.
